meanings.definition: Infotainments: a blend of information and entertainment
meanings.sent1: The infotainments on the TV show kept the audience engaged with both facts and fun.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching infotainments that educate me while also entertaining me.
meanings.sent3: The infotainments at the museum made learning about history feel like a game.
meanings.sent4: Her presentation was like a plate of infotainments, mixing knowledge with humor.
meanings.sent5: The infotainments in the magazine were so interesting, I couldn't put it down.

meanings.definition: Infotainments: media content that combines news and amusement
meanings.sent1: The infotainments on the website provide a perfect mix of current events and entertainment.
meanings.sent2: Many people prefer infotainments over traditional news broadcasts for a more engaging experience.
meanings.sent3: The infotainments on social media can sometimes be more entertaining than informative.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling style turns regular news into infotainments that captivate the audience.
meanings.sent5: The infotainments on the radio station are a great way to stay informed while having fun.
